DOC.brief_summary: A prospective study 50 consecutive patient go low body lift procedure perform . Measures include comorbidities complication . Risk factor assess include patient age , gender , high lifetime body mass index ( BMI ) ( BMI max ) , current BMI , excess weight loss ( EWL ) , type weight loss nicotine consumption .
DOC.criteria: massive weight loss age > 18 year < 65 year excess weight loss > 66 % current body mass index < 35 stable weight weight loss least 12 month insulin dependent diabetes mellitus
